com.motorola.mod

Class ModBacklight

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.motorola.mod.ModBacklight

  • public abstract class ModBacklight
extends Object
    The ModBacklight class includes the functionality to control a Backlight class device on a Moto Mod. The Moto Mod must have a Display and must expose a backlight control for this Display through the LIGHTS protocol.

    An application does not instantiate this class directly; instead, an application needs to retrieve a ModBacklight instance through ModManager.getClassManager(device, ModBacklight.class).
